mapper.sql: ID, ITEM_NO,FOR_TYPE, ENAME, CNAME, PATTERN, SORT_NO, TYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, REMARK, VALID
mapper.select:
( SELECT
FROM UNP_ITEM_PROPERTY WHERE ITEM_NO = ( SELECT ITEM_TYPE_NO FROM UNP_ITEM_TYPE WHERE CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) UNION ( SELECT
FROM UNP_ITEM_PROPERTY UIP WHERE UIP.ITEM_NO = ( SELECT TYPE_NO FROM UNP_GROUP_TYPE WHERE CODE = ( SELECT GROUP_CODE FROM UNP_ITEM_TYPE WHERE UNP_ITEM_TYPE.CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UNP_ITEM_PROPERTY (ID, ITEM_NO,FOR_TYPE, ENAME, CNAME, PATTERN, SORT_NO, TYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, REMARK, VALID) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{forType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
UPDATE UNP_ITEM_PROPERTY
ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FOR_TYPE = #{forType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENAME = #{eName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CNAME = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PATTERN = #{pattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
